#summary (FAR.NET 3.x only!) Loads IronPython scripts as FAR.NET tools.

= Introduction =

NOTE: *It is not developed or supported*. The last available version is only for Far Manager 1.x with FAR.NET 3.x.

The plugin loads all the scripts from Scripts directory. Scripts register a few tools available in the FAR plugin menu and in the command line (the default command prefix is "ipy").
